title: Support should get less ranked rewards than everyone else
body: They do a lot less work than everyone else.

replies.body: Support is the hardest class to carry with. If anything they deserve more rewards than scum like you.
because it's impossible for the carried to carry.
C'mon guys, these kind of support threads are the most obvious kind of bait threads.
yea this is the dumbest thing ive ever heard

You do realize that Supports are the main reason the carries on your team get fed right? Sure supports fall off late game, but they are the reason for your success ultimately. Supports have one of the hardest jobs in the game and climbing ranks as a support main is one of the hardest things to do.
And with this comment I am assuming that you got boosted.

Do you actually believe this? Really. Supports have the most playmaking potential of anyone on the team due to the high amount of cc/utility they possess. Which is why I disagree with most non-meta supports because supports do a lot more than just chill with the adc and help them out a bit.

As someone who plays a lot of ADC, I strongly disagree. The last few months more than ever.

ADCs are almost useless now in lane, after the repetitive nerfing of whichever one is on top instead of buffing any of the lower ones. There's really nothing an adc can do other than last hit and build up gold. The support is the true carry of bot lane right now, any time your bot lane is getting kills and a lead and carrying a game it's because your support did really well (or your enemy support outright sucked). 

The difference between games with a skilled support, a competent support, and a bad support, is immediately recognizable. Before the 3 minute mark I can usually tell you whether I'm going to be getting fed as the ADC, the lane is going to be stalemated, or I'm going to get hammered - even if no kills have happened yet.
